welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Burr Ridge, where charm and luxury meet in the heart of the United States. Get ready to experience our quaint town known for its scenic nature trails, charming boutiques, and cozy cafes. We hope you enjoy your stay and explore all that Burr Ridge has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Midway Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Midway Airport, primarily serving Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft and offers exclusive services for their passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Airlines and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines and other select airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Municipal Airport, where all domestic and international flights are served.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and chartered flights, providing a more luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal, free of charge for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chicago Lansing Municipal Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Chicago Lansing Municipal Airport, primarily used for regional and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport serves all commercial and charter flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for unlimited access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Kankakee Airport provides services for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Greater Kankakee Airport handles all freight and shipping operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
